TriggerGroup.name: Illusions ignored by default
TriggerGroup.script:
--[[ you may see duplicate triggers here; the idea is to have it organized in one place and not sprinkled all over the system such that it is easy to share, update enable and disable triggers for you.
this folder gets enabled when you do 'tn a' or 'tn antiillusion' ]]

regexCodeList.string: Ruiku's eyes roll back into his head and he begins to chant ugly, discordant words. With each syllable uttered, white, viscous smoke oozes out of his mouth.

Holding an ashen blade of bone wrapped in elven sinew poised at an angle overhead, Jozen unleashes a violent assault at your left leg. Jozen strikes the tendon above your left heel, and you scream in agony as it's completely severed.
With a heavy overhand stroke, Ixion slams a steel klangaxe down upon you. Ixion hacks your neck, and blood fountains out in a thick spray.
Thalkros's eyes roll back into his head and he begins to chant ugly, discordant words. With each syllable uttered, white, viscous smoke oozes out of his mouth.
The smoke envelops you, leaving behind a thick coat of sticky slime.
Thalkros pronounces that you are under an ill omen, and a sense of imminent foreboding descends upon you.
With a grim smile, Krellan touches the trees and sap courses out in a thick syrup that lunges at you, coating you in the viscid liquid.
Nydekion impales his blades deep into your gut, which spills forth blood.
You gasp as a surging pain strikes you in your right hip.
A sense of extreme nausea washes over you.
Swinging an iron maiden war hammer in an underhand arc, Thoros strikes at you. Your left leg is smashed with an awesome blow and pulverized into a bloody stump.
You eat
return true

Trigger.name: no beast on beast focus
Trigger.script: if mm.conf.beastfocus then mm.config.set("beastfocus", false, true) mm.echo("No beast present, turning off beast focus") end

Trigger.name: Affmessages
Trigger.script:
local aff = multimatches[2][2]
aff = mm.afftranslation[aff] or aff
if not (mm.valid["simple"..aff] or mm.valid["affmsg_"..aff]) then mm.echof("(this aff, %s, is missing from m&m's affmessages db - this is a minor thing)", aff) return end
if (aff == "an unknown ailment" or aff == "an unknown affliction") and mm.knownaff then mm.valid.removeunknownaff() --not really unknown else (mm.valid["affmsg_"..aff] or mm.valid["simple"..aff])() end

A two-headed hamster of chaos shakes himself vigorously, sending wisps of fur flying everywhere. The flying fur takes on a life of its own as it actively seeks to irritate and harass you.
Countless filaments suddenly lash out at you from an aetheretic slivven, tiny poisonous barbs dig into your flesh causing you to stagger on your feet as your body locks up in agony.

Freeing his hands, a champion of war raises them dramatically to summon coruscating blasts of azure lightning, which careen erratically from his palms in wide chaotic forks, searing your skin and knocking you backwards.
A garghast swipes at you with a crooked arm, and you feel numb throughout your body.
Bheion, an aslaran mystic chants softly under his breath, and suddenly you are unable to move.
A mutated, undead cave-fisher jerks forward, covering you in a spray of his saliva. You scream as the acidic spit eats into your skin.
Pouncing on your foot, a vicious slivven pierces you with his stinger and pumps poisonous fluids into your blood. A warm feeling fills your limbs as they lock and your mind goes blank.
Your limbs suddenly lock up and cease to function.
Chanting in a deep, baleful voice, Prudenzio d'Murani glares at you as your muscles suddenly stiffen and lock up.
A loathsome cockatrice gazes at you, its eyes glowing red.
A Lady of the Argent Light regards you with a frigid look of disdain as an icy cold seeps deep into your bones, causing your teeth to chatter loudly.
Tilting his head back, Crow opens its beak and lets forth a terrifying caw, causing the very air to quake and forcing you to freeze in fear.
Lifting his sceptre, a king of justice intones in a booming voice, causing the scale on top to tip back and forth. Suddenly, you feel as if you have been judged and found wanting.
A glowing sphere of harmony pulses brightly and crackling bolts of whitest lightning fork from its placid, glowing surface and slam into you.
A demonic nagakali sways back and forth hypnotically before you, causing you to lose control of your body.
Warpaint glowing faintly, an aged orc elder points a crooked finger at you, snarling out a curse.
A shadowy garshade grasps you roughly, allowing its dark aura to partially encompass you. Your muscles freeze up painfully as the chill of the grave seeps into your body.

Her wings spreading wide behind her, Mesadari Rhiero, Keeper of the Eternal Flame raises her foreclaws into the air and looses an earth-rending bellow, her wings loosening a strange, pollen-like powder which quickly finds its way into your nose, sinuses, and lungs.
A luminous purple spined starfish spins about in the sand. Several spines rocket from his form to pierce you painfully. An unnerving chill runs down your spine as you lose control of your limbs.
A lost soul of death sweeps the area with his flaming malevolent gaze, and your muscles lock even as you combust in a conflagration of emerald balefire.

A lambency glides in a slow circle around you, reaching out with one insubstantial limb to lightly touch you. Blue sparks flash where he touches you, and the whispering in your mind grows dark and menacing. He suddenly surges forward and your body is wracked by electrical force.

Pointing his eyeball at you imperiously, a cadaverous gentleman screams as the air around him shimmers with magical activity. Suddenly, a scintillating beam of energy emits forth from his ocular organ and slams into you, seizing your body and warping your soul.
You find yourself drawn into the hypnotic gaze of a towering, surreal jester, whose eyes wiggle and dance bizzarely, sending sparks of dizzying pain through your head.
Tendrils of grey smoke wash outward from Kesisha, the First Dame, coiling about you and rooting you to the spot, burning you where they touch.
Your world crumbles as you realize how wrong you were to stand against the Time Dames!
A sophisticated viscanti assistant grabs you firmly and pulls you in close, jabbing a concealed blade into your neck, before shoving you backwards.

A haunting, harmonious note washes over you, clear as the sky and empty as the Void, filling you with an awe-struck sense of horror. The boundless beauty of the note is matched only by its promise of endless despair - the beauty of a heart as still as the grave and twice as cold.
A thorn beast lashes out at your feet with a barbed tendril, sending you sprawling.
Digging sharp spurs into the flanks of his steed, a champion of war whips it into a frenzy, trampling you under iron shod hooves.
Bhalegu, Lord of the Blasted Sand stomps on the ground, causing the earth to shake and the ground to buck beneath your feet.
Drawing back an enormous fist, Brom, Lord of the Pocked Boulder punches you in the chest, staggering you.
Growling with lips curled back, Ashtorath the Raging smashes his enormous fist into you, sending you flying.
Ashtorath the Raging stomps on the ground and screams to the sky. An enormous explosion shatters your surroundings, angry red flames coursing throughout the chamber and burning your flesh.
Eyes blazing with unholy fire, a hideous archdemon touches you, releasing a black fire that freezes your guts while burning your flesh.
Swirling violently, a floating urn's metallic tentacle crashes into you, knocking you to the ground.
Both heads down, a two-headed abhorrence charges into you, knocking you to the ground.
A gargantuan red scorpion rears up and slams into you, knocking you to the ground.
A bloated parasite drips mucus onto you, and suddenly you feel too weak to stand.
A slush elemental dissolves and spreads himself over the entire surface of the floor, turning it slick and causing you to slip and fall into the freezing mass.
^Slipping around you quickly, .+ locks his arms around your neck from behind\. With an increase of pressure you quickly find the world fading to black around you\.$
A kephera worker fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
A kephera warrior fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
Hive King Rashepotep scoops your legs out from under you, quickly coming down against you and pinning your limbs in a secure grapple.
Pawing the dirt, a two-headed abhorrence charges at you, knocking you off your feet.
An imposing harpy spider brings her wings forward quickly, knocking you to the ground with a great buffet of wind.
A hulking three-horned bull paws the ground angrily before charging at you, knocking you to the ground with a painful crunch.
A gargantuan red scorpion rears up and slams into you, knocking you to the ground.
A stainless steel goat rears up on its hind legs and brings its metallic hooves down upon you, knocking you to the ground.
Hive King Tutmosotep grasps your wrist in his firm grip, twisting it sharply and forcing your arm straight as he takes you to the ground and locks your arm in place, applying intense pressure.
A horrific, diseased parasite spins wildly around and his black aura solidifies into tentacles that wrap around your legs and trip you!
A carrion beetle slams into your legs, knocking you to the ground and trampling you. You hear the sickening sound of bones crunching.
A carrion beetle rears up and slams into you, knocking you to the ground.
A krokani guard catches your feet with the end of his pike-staff, sending you sprawling to the floor.
Putting his head down, Kar'chen, Lord of the krokani charges at you, his huge body sending you sprawling to the floor.
A female aslaran crouches on powerful legs that bulge with muscle, and abruptly headbutts you in the gut, knocking you over and winding you.
A kephera scout fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
A kephera monk fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
A mantis-like mantekarr fixes his compound eyes on you and beats his prismatic wings furiously, sending a blast of air that knocks you to the ground.
^A .+, knocking you to the ground\.$
With an angry roar, an apterous manticore surges forward and rams square into you with his hulking body. The sheer force sends you reeling backwards to the ground.
A gila lizard slams into your legs, knocking you to the ground and trampling you. You hear the sickening sound of bones crunching.
A lumbering sandojin suddenly leaps and crashes into you, sending you tumbling to the ground.

A bestial garul tilts his head back and produces a blood-curdling howl that resonates off the mountainside. Momentarily surprised, you trip and land hard on the frozen ground, stunned by the ferocity of the howl.
A writhing parasite sinks his sharp teeth into your ankles, injecting a strange toxin that drains the strength from your legs, making you topple over.
A kephera attendant fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking hisarm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
A failed gravedigger experiment howls fiercely before charging with all his might towards you. His body slams into you violently, sending you tumbling head over heels.
A hanging loamadore grabs you and pulls you up into the ceiling, before dropping you back to the ground.
A two-headed abhorrence slams into your legs, knocking you to the ground and trampling you. You hear the sickening sound of bones crunching.
With a sweep of its branches, a grotesque ravenwood tree knocks you off your feet.
Pawing the dirt, a deepstone rockeater charges at you, knocking you off your feet.
A viscanti servant snarls viciously and runs headlong at you, bashing into you with his shoulder and knocking you heavily to the ground.
Strekdel, the craftsman snarls viciously and runs headlong at you, bashing into you with his shoulder and knocking you heavily to the ground.
A behemoth taurian guardsman snarls and knocks you to the ground with the broad side of his axe, stomping brutally on your chest with a powerful hoof.

A bestial garul tilts her head back and produces a blood-curdling howl that resonates off the mountainside. Momentarily surprised, you trip and land hard on the frozen ground, stunned by the ferocity of the howl.
Pawing the dirt, a mountain rockeater charges at you, knocking you off your feet.
You slip suddenly on the icy path and fall down, icicles breaking free from the surroundings and falling down on top of you.

A monstrous ice devil wraps his hand about your neck, lifting you off your feet as a frigid cold invades your airway, robbing your breath. With a dismissive flick, he tosses you to one side where you crumple like a rag doll.
Brom, Lord of the Pocked Boulder stomps on the ground, causing the earth to shake and the ground to buck beneath your feet.
With a fearsome roar, an apterous manticore pounces on top of you, knocking you to the ground and tearing flesh from bone with his shark-like teeth.
A shadow centipede scurries fast figure eights between your legs, tripping you where you stand.
In a devastating display, a torrential firestorm explodes in a radius around Tejas, Lady of Blossoming Fires, holocaustal fires annihilating your flesh, the shockwave throwing you off your feet.
In a devastating display, a torrential firestorm explodes in a radius around Agni, Lady of Smouldering Embers, holocaustal fires annihilating your flesh, the shockwave throwing you off your feet.
Hive King Imhatatep grasps your wrist in his firm grip, twisting it sharply and forcing your arm straight as he takes you to the ground and locks your arm in place, applying intense pressure.
Putting his head down, Kar'chen, the Castellan of Djarrakh charges at you, his huge body sending you sprawling to the floor.
A crystal grodak pounces and slams into you, sending you crashing to the ground.
Whipping his massive tail around, A bulbous swamp slug slaps you with it, catapulting you backwards through the air and knocking the wind out of you.
Flying this way and that, a spirit warrior suddenly grabs you with his freezing hands and throws youto the ground.
A spawn of the horde begins to growl deeply, the rumbling ever increasing in volume until he suddenly lunges forward, ripping at your flesh and knocking you over.
Swinging his sceptre at you, a king of justice taps you painfully on the shoulders. You kneel forcibly and submit his command.
Flying this way and that, a spirit warrior suddenly grabs you with his freezing hands and throws you to the ground.
An icelad scoffs arrogantly before shoving you with great force, causing you to fall down.
A perfect chord resonates outward from a glowing sphere of harmony becoming uniformly louder until your body shakes with intense pain, and you are thrown off your feet.
A kephera sentinel fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
You fall to your knees screaming as a ball of floating light suddenly slams into your gut and explodes in a brilliant flower of burning sparks.
A Knight of the Lady reaches to her back and pulls out a strange netting which she flings at you sweeping you off your feet.
An aged orc elder knocks your legs out from under you with his staff, before slamming it down into your gut.

A rotten garskull utters a short, rasping sound as he detaches his radius, swinging it around and catching you in the temple. As you fall to the ground you notice a rotten garskull return the bone to his forearm neatly.
Gravynia, Lady of the Cracked Stone stomps on the ground, causing the earth to shake and the ground to buck beneath your feet.
Zeforos, Lord of the North Wind rapidly begins spinning in circles, a vortex of wind quickly enveloping the area as wild gusts of wind send you hurtling through the air.
An adolescent roc bats at you with powerful wings, knocking you to the ground.
A sleek grey mrriak leaps suddenly at your legs, slamming the weight of its body against yours and knocking you to the ground.
The elevator jolts very abruptly to a stop and your knees buckle, sending you sprawling.
A mutilated gravedigger howls fiercely before charging with all his might towards you. His bodyslams into you violently, sending you tumbling head over heels.

A watchful kephera sentry fluidly steps in close to you, grasping your wrist in one hand and snaking his arm around your waist before flipping you solidly across his thorax and sending you to the ground.
You find yourself on the ground, staring at the sky as chills of unease ripple up your spine.
A two-headed abhorrence slams into your legs, knocking you to the ground and trampling you. You hear the sickening sound of bones crunching.
Pawing the dirt, a two-headed abhorrence charges at you, knocking you off your feet.

Ashtorath, Duke of Inescapable Damnation stomps on the ground and screams to the sky. An enormous explosion shatters your surroundings, angry red flames coursing throughout the chamber and burning your flesh.
Pashi, Lady of the South Wind rapidly begins spinning in circles, a vortex of wind quickly enveloping the area as wild gusts of wind send you hurtling through the air.
Drawing back an enormous fist, Bhalegu, Lord of the Blasted Sand punches you in the chest, staggering you.
The memory of falling through the Pit of Insufferable Cruelty is branded into your soul, for countless tortures were visited upon you, each one more twisted and painful than the last.
Gorgulu the Devourer of Souls forms a huge, knobby limb of flesh that grows out of its body at an alarming speed and slams into you, knocking you to the ground.
With a sigh of disgust, a bloodthirsty loboshigaru pilgrim pushes you down into the dirt.
Without warning, you suddenly slip on the frozen ground, crashing head first into the ice.
An ice mammoth swings her trunk at you, hitting you solidly across the skull and flinging you to the ground.
A mutilated gravedigger howls fiercely before charging with all his might towards you. His body slams into you violently, sending you tumbling head over heels.

A bestial garul tilts her head back and produces a blood-curdling howl that resonates off the mountainside. Momentarily surprised, you trip and land hard on the frozen ground, stunned by the ferocity of the howl.

Rawari, a wiry garul tilts his head back and produces a blood-curdling howl that resonates off the mountainside. Momentarily surprised, you trip and land hard on the frozen ground, stunned by the ferocity of the howl.
As you attempt to leave several of the snowmen chortle as they spring to life, bouncing back and forth as they pummel you with a flurry of snowballs, eventually knocking you over.
A stalwart krokani warden catches your feet with the end of his pike-staff, sending you sprawling to the floor.
A shambling zombie stumbles forward with an unintelligible roar, slamming into you and throwing you to the ground.
A hulking zombie stumbles forward with an unintelligible roar, slamming into you and throwing you to the ground.
A zombie covered in tumours wraps his slimy tongue around your body, pulling you against him while he gnaws on your face.
A Golden Champion raises her hand into the air and clenches her fist, and your bones snap in response as you fall to the ground, howling in agony.
A mass of tentacles sweeps across the room with a thick tentacle.
You are swept off your feet by a giant tentacle.
A torrent of ooze gushes out of a blob, sweeping you off your feet.
Crackling lances of viridescent lightning crawl across an enormous gate of beaten copper before slamming into you, throwing you, smouldering, off your feet.
With a swish of her head, the White Doe whacks you with her antlers, knocking you to the ground.
A green-garbed leprechaun chuckles loudly before disappearing in a blur of emerald light. Suddenly a loud CRACK emits as the ground rushes up, and you realize you've been hit.
Stepping back defensively, a smug, darkly-dressed leprechaun draws out a handful of gold sovereigns and scatters them on the ground with a toss. You slip on one of them and fall flat on your face.
A leprechaun clad in light green lassoes your feet with the strings of clover from his hat and pulls sharply. You land with a bump on your backside.
Staring at you coldly with her glittering, composite eyes, Zenobia the Queen of Queens drains the strength from your muscles, leaving you on the floor as a crippled mass of useless limbs.
Whirling furiously upon you, Honourable Maki Nok sucks in a deep breath and unleashes a bestial roar, knocking you clear off your feet.
You scream hideously, crumbling to the ground and grasping at your head as a thousand unheard voices become heard.
Bellowing a warcry, Wiliki, Justice of the Icewynd sweeps his bladed staff about in a fury, hacking indiscriminately into you with a frigid fury that rends your flesh and knocks you to the ground.
Loranara, Wisdom of the Icewynd flicks a wing negligently at you. An ice-clad feather whips through the air in a blur, slamming into your jugular and blowing you off your feet with a spray of blood.
Supreme Master Luciphage places a thumb on your forehead and your very soul feels as though it is being pulled and twisted. You stagger backwards, utterly defiled by the touch.
With a cold smile, Supreme Master Luciphage raises a clenched fist and twists his wrist. You collapse as your bones suddenly twist and break.
Frowning at you, Prince Donfin Fardori delivers a jaw-shattering backhand across your face, sending you tumbling backward.
^Staring at you coldly with her glittering\, composite eyes\, Hive Queen (\w+) drains the strength from your muscles\, leaving you on the floor as a crippled mass of useless limbs\.$
^Hive Queen (\w+) pauses for a moment\, her many eyes flashing in anger\. Agony and pain suddenly seize your body\, as a foreign presence seeks to shatter both body and mind\.$
Zenobia the Queen of Queens pauses for a moment, her many eyes flashing in anger. Agony and pain suddenly seize your body, as a foreign presence seeks to shatter both body and mind.
Swinging an armored gauntlet fist at you, a spectral paladin connects and knocks you sprawling to the ground.
A Warrior-Priest of the Forge rushes at you, smashing his bulky weight into you, slamming you against a nearby wall.

Chief Fionaha Frostfeather reaches into her satchel before darting forward with dexterous grace, expertly binding your hands and legs in sinew and slamming you to the ground before you even realize what has occurred.
Chief Innana Icewing spreads her wings wide and leaps back, drawing a series of small, hollow bone spears and throwing them at you with deadly accuracy.
Chief Innana Icewing whips out with her spear as she drops low, sweeping your legs out from beneath you before twirling and driving the tip of the weapon into your chest.
A snowman glides suddenly towards you and bumps his bulky body into you, knocking you down.
Queen Serelyn, the Righteous Mother raises her hand, pointing at you imperiously. Elemental energies suddenly rage about you, scouring flesh from muscle and muscle from bone.

A grinning, painted jester laughs brightly, producing a coil of rope and trussing you up before you've time to blink. With a wink, she places a finger on your chest and pushes, sending you toppling back.
Barreling forward, Merenir, the Aspiring Hero catches you about the waist, driving you to the floor and landing a solid punch that shatters your cheek.
Dropping low to the floor, Alodale, the Villainous Lord sweeps his leg about, deftly tripping you and sending you crashing to the floor.
A mutated tumbleweed lashes out with a thorny briar that ensnares your legs and causes you to trip.
^Hive Queen (\w+) pauses for a moment, her many eyes flashing in anger\. Agony and pain suddenly seize your body, as a foreign presence seeks to shatter both body and mind\.$
With a yell, the Muffin Man barrels into you, knocking you down and rolling over you with his great muffin body.
A zombie covered in tumours whips his elongated tongue around your neck, pulling you to your knees and choking you.

A pale, long-limbed jester laughs brightly, producing a coil of rope and trussing you up before you've time to blink. With a wink, she places a finger on your chest and pushes, sending you toppling back.
A tormented zombie stumbles forward with an unintelligible roar, slamming into you and throwing you to the ground.
A dwarven flame warrior rushes at you, smashing his bulky weight into you, slamming you against a nearby wall.
The faces of an opaque octahedron momentarily separate releasing a flurry of wind and lightning that tears at your flesh before throwing you to the ground.
Your mind is suddenly battered by dozens of angry and shrieking voices, driving you to the ground.
A delayed tremor ripples through the ground and sends you sprawling.
With a tremendous roar, a towering patchwork monstrosity smashes both fists into the ground. The earth rumbles and quakes, tossing you around like a rag doll and knocking you off your feet.
A garghast reaches out and grabs you, holding you tight to its chest in a smouldering embrace.
A Lady of the Argent Light offers up a rasping prayer to Mother Moon above, and you begin to grow feeble and weak, your limbs withering away, as her ancient stare pierces deep into you.
Bowling you over with his large body, a wooly mammoth tramples across you with his massive feet.
An orclach lancer rears his powerful destrier up upon its hind legs, grinning triumphantly as it crashes down upon you, trampling you brutally to the ground.
A mass of tentacles reaches out and grabs you with a thick tentacle, hoisting you into the air and crushing your limbs before dropping you again.
^A giant \w+ slug slaps you with his massive tail, forcefully slamming you against the surrounding walls\.$
A demented, monstrous nagameth sends his tail at you and crushes your body against the wall, causing your bones to break.
A shadow manta swings her tail at you with extraordinary force, breaking bones.

Enticing you within striking distance with its lure of flesh, a hard-shelled, many-legged cave-fisher quickly lunges forward and clamps down on you with his massive mandibles, crushing your bones beneath his titan grip.
A greater manifestation of nightmare lashes out with a massive fist. Despite it's vaporous appearance, the blow feels solid enough as it strikes; your bones snap beneath the crushing blow.
^A (\w+) Lirangsha elder nods wisely, his very body radiating with energy which fills the room and reveals the truth within its power, the painful truth that violence begets only violence\.$
Without warning a towering patchwork monstrosity snatches you in his hand and squeezes tightly. Pain shoots through your body as something within you snaps.

regexCodeList.string: A shadowed cultist draws a malevolent glowing glyph in the shape of an ouroboros in the air, and with a dark curse it explodes violently in your face.
Throwing back his arms, a lost soul of death gestures imperiously at you and a web of icicles form upon your freezing skin as he sucks the very heat from your body.

Trigger.name: Sirens
Trigger.script: -- stupidity has to be last, for the amulet case mm.valid.proper_prone() mm.valid.simplestupidity()

regexCodeList.string: An alluring siren of beauty sings a series of hauntingly beautiful notes that drives you to your knees, weeping as the song remains maddeningly beyond your ability to comprehend it.
Hanili, Beauty of the Icewynd blows you a kiss, a cloud of frost pouring from her lips to engulf you, drawing you into lethargy as the warmth seeps from your body.
In a clear voice, a blithe Lirangsha singer sings a perfect high note that pierces your ears and makes your very soul quail.
^.+ twirls and spins angrily shooting several beams of incandescent light that burn away your flesh\.$
Bheion, an aslaran mystic flings black powder into your face that eats away at your eyes and skin.
A sand cobra rears up, and then spits a stream of venom into your face. You feel your eyes begin to burn as the dark liquid sinks in.
A hanging loamadore thrusts a glob of mud down into your eyes, blinding you.

A bulbous ribbachi suddenly hops up, slamming into your face. You push it away and hear it hit the ground with a grotesque squelch, yet your vision remains black. You begin to claw at the thick, doughy substance that covers your face, yet find it begins to spread across your body.
A gnome artisan grabs a screwdriver from his apron and stabs you repeatedly in the face with it.
Geleto, the Toymaker grabs a screwdriver from his apron and stabs you repeatedly in the face with it.
One of a two-headed abhorrence's heads exhales a hot blast of steam into your eyes, blinding you.
Agonized shrieks of pain tear themselves from your lungs as you collapse to your knees, grabbing at your face. Thick, viscous fluid begins to pour into your eyes as skin begins to slough away.
Slipping one hand into his sleeve, Librarian Hinani Cloudwalker flicks a glittering sapphire at you.
A two-headed eagle screeches loudly, the sound reverberates through your head bringing blood to your ears.
An anguished zombie lets loose an agonising scream as a dark miasma erupts from her mouth and slams into you, sending your senses reeling.

Dungari, Bounty of the Icewynd places a finger upon your forehead and whispers a word. A pain throbs within your skull before erupting out your eyes and ears, chilling you to the bone as you lose your senses.
You are momentarily blinded by a ray of refracted light.
The smoking ground beneath your feet sends a wave of nausea through your body.
A delayed tremor ripples through the ground and sends you sprawling.

A gigantic maggot lurches forward and regurgitates over your body, covering you in a disgusting black fluid. As the projectile vomit touches your skin, it immediately catches aflame, and you flail about in a maddening stupor.
Lifting her voice, a willowy fae of nature begins to sing a high, lonely song. Sticks and stones fall from the branches about you, bruising and cutting you as the chatter of birds pierces your mind.
Battered staff suddenly glowing with power, an aged orc elder taps you surprisingly gently on the head with it. Your thoughts become muddled and a searing pain shoots through your mind.

Gibbering madly, Loredana d'Lardick stares intently at you. You feel the horrifying presence of the Devourer of Souls brush across your consciousness as maddening images and an unending hunger unfold ravenously before you.

A manifested paradox of knowledge reaches out to your mind, filling your consciousness with conflicting, irreconcilable truths. Your mind grows dull as an uncontrollable pain wells up between your ears, and you fight a desperate urge to flee.
Rapidly beating his wings, an expeditious manticore causes the air to stir violently and buffets you with great force. The impact sends you flying into the wall headfirst.
Lifting his sceptre, a king of justice intones in a booming voice, causing the scale on top to tip back and forth. Suddenly, you feel as if you have been judged and found wanting.
Rearing up on his hind legs, an emerald hunter dashes his hooves down on your head, knocking you reeling.
A dryad wreathed in flowering kudzu stares at you as her eyes shift colour ever-faster, filling your mind with incomprehensible gibberish.
You are chewed and spit out from the Pit of a Thousand Hungers, like a piece of gristle. Nightmarish visions of unspeakable horrors linger in your mind.
Strange whispers suddenly emanate from the air around a twilight eidolon as a deep aura of twilight descends upon you, causing you to scream in anguish as you feel your sanity being flayed away.

A sibylline egerias scribes your future with her liana-shaped feet in swooping curls of blood; suddenly, your vision goes black and you relive memories of past trauma and pains, leaving you in a delusional stupor.

With an amused chuckle, a deformed lucidian points his staff towards you, and then upwards. Your body suddenly freezes in place before jolting into the air, then back down to the ground with a sickening crunch.
An ice mammoth swings her trunk at you, hitting you solidly across the skull and flinging you to the ground.
Glowing with a fulminating brilliance, a coruscating spark overtakes your vision, showing you an unfathomable design of thin lines and unfamiliar symbols that presses down on your mind.

A cadaverous gentleman glares balefully at you as he curses from behind his grinning teeth. A second passes as your mind is overwhelmed by a council of voices, revealing ill-fated omens and dark secrets which scrape at your sanity.
Pointing a fat finger at you, Physician Maurog Slaur utters a deep croak. Your vision swims as a sharp pain blossoms between your eyes.
Sir Kini Icewing whirls his halberd about dextrously before slamming the butt into the side of your head, crushing bone as stars explode before your eyes.
With a cracked giggle, a grinning, painted jester leaps behind you, leaning forward to whisper soft secrets into your ear that send your sanity crumbling away from you.

local starthour, endhour, startnoon, endnoon, startday, endday, currentday = osdate("%I", secondsearliest), osdate("%I", secondslatest), osdate("%p", secondsearliest), osdate("%p", secondslatest), osdate("%A", secondsearliest), osdate("%A", secondslatest), osdate("%A")
fg("dark_slate_gray")
local daytext = "" if currentday == endday and timeleft < 24 then daytext = " today" elseif currentday == endday and timeleft >= 24 then daytext = " next "..currentday else daytext = " on "..endday end
echo(string.format(" -> expires from %d%s%s to %d%s%s", starthour, (startnoon == endnoon and "" or startnoon:lower()), (startday == endday and "" or (" on ".. startday)), endhour, endnoon:lower(), daytext )) resetFormat() deselect()

Trigger.name: Domoth org status
Trigger.script:
if not ndb then return end
local domoth, holder = matches[2], matches[3] if holder == "Free" or holder == "The" then return end
if ndb.isenemy(holder) then if selectString(domoth, 1) > 0 then fg("red"); resetFormat(); deselect() end
if selectString(holder.." controls the Throne", 1) > 0 then fg("red"); resetFormat(); deselect() end else if selectString(domoth, 1) > 0 then fg("green"); resetFormat(); deselect() end end
local org = ndb.getorg(holder) if not org then ndb.addname(holder) org = "?" end
ndborgs[org] = (ndborgs[org] or 0) + 1

Trigger.name: Stop (domoth status)
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("Ooh lala...", 0) domoth_matching = nil
echo'\n'
local text = {} for org,count in pairs(ndborgs) do text[#text+1] = string.format("%s holds %s", org,count) end
mm.echof("%s Domoth%s.", mm.concatand(text), text[#text]:sub(#text[#text]) == "1" and '' or "s")
ndborgs = nil

The fire quickly burns out, leaving you charred and gasping for what little usable air remains. Such things are fleeting concerns, however, in lieu of the bright pink peeps and delicious looking chocolate-chip gingerbread men dancing in grass skirts around you... Yum!!

Such is short-lived, however, as the reality that begins to emerge from the field of white becomes one rife with madness, nothing making sense and everything nearly recognizable yet, inexplicably, remains entirely incomprehensible. You scream, struggling to awaken from the nightmarish dream you must have wandered into during a fit of fever-driven night terrors.

^A pool of shadows and decay floods out from (\w+)'s treehollow and pours down \w+ trunk\. A blanket of sinisterly chittering insects, their multi-faceted eyes glowing a deep red, manifests from within the murky shadows and slowly creeps across the ground in an impassable carpet of hunger, rage, and doom\.$

Like a vile, unstoppable disease, the blanket of red-eyed insects that has infested the ground surges forward and coils its way up your legs. Before you can even begin to fend them off, they have already wormed, slithered, crawled, and eaten their way inside of you, spreading their dread contagions far and wide, deep within the inner sanctum of your body.
Pulsing as one and screaming with millions of insectoid voices, a blanket of creeping horrors infests the ground.

Alias.name: (vlua) Run lua code
Alias.script:
-- you can do things like: -- vlua 2+2 -- vlua
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = {f()} if r then if type(r[1]) == 'nil' then mm.echof("Code ran OK, there were no results.") mm.showprompt() elseif #r == 1 then if type(r) == 'string' or type(r) == 'number' then mm.echof("Code ran OK, results are:\n "..r[1]) else display(r[1]) end else display(r) end end

Script.name: Load externals
Script.script:
--[[ m&m system loader, made by Vadi ]]
local _sep if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end require "lfs"
function mm_load() mm_load = function () end if package.loaded["mm"] or package.loaded["m&m"] then return end
-- loader for packages local foldername for item in lfs.dir(getMudletHomeDir()) do foldername = item:match("(%w+) m&m") if foldername and lfs.attributes(getMudletHomeDir().."/"..foldername.." m&m/m&m") then local oldpath = package.path local system_path = getMudletHomeDir().."/"..foldername.." m&m/" package.path = system_path .. "?;" .. system_path .. "?.lua;" .. system_path .. "?.dll;" .. system_path .. "?.so;"
local s,m = pcall(require, "m&m") package.path = oldpath
if not s then display(m) return end
mm.echofn("Loaded & ready to go, version %s (", tostring(mm.version)) echoLink("homepage", '(openUrl or openURL)"http://mm.vadisystems.com"', "m&m homepage") decho(mm.getDefaultColor()..")\n") return end end
-- old/backup loader local mm_location = getMudletHomeDir() .. _sep .. "m&m_location" local system_path -- location of the system's folder with a trailing slash local f,msg
-- first-time launch on profile - no location file if not lfs.attributes(mm_location) then system_path = mm_whereisit() if not system_path then return end else f,msg = io.open(mm_location, "r+") assert(f, msg)
-- this should give us the folder it's in system_path = f:read("*l")
if string.sub(system_path, -1) == "/" or string.sub(system_path, -1) == [[\]] then system_path = string.sub(system_path, 1, -2) end
-- if we had an invalid path stored if not lfs.attributes(system_path) then f = nil -- invalidate handler, so we'll write the new location to disk system_path = mm_whereisit() if not system_path then return end end end
-- re-add the suffix that we might have had to strip earlier for lfs.attributes to work on Windows if not (string.sub(system_path, -1) == "/" or string.sub(system_path, -1) == [[\]]) then system_path = system_path .. "/" end
local oldpath = package.path package.path = system_path .. "?;" .. system_path .. "?.lua;" .. system_path .. "?.dll;" .. system_path .. "?.so;"
local s,m = pcall(require, "m&m") package.path = oldpath
if not s then display(m) return end
mm.echofn("Loaded & ready to go, version %s (", tostring(mm.version)) echoLink("homepage", '(openUrl or openURL)"http://vadisystems.com/mm"', "m&m homepage") decho(mm.getDefaultColor()..")\n")
-- update file if not f then f,msg = io.open(mm_location, "w") if not f then display(msg) return end else f:seek("set",0) end
f:write(system_path) f:close() end
-- find the folder function mm_whereisit() local path = invokeFileDialog(false, "Where is the m&m folder? Select it and click Open")
if path == "" then return nil else return path .. _sep end end
mm_load()

Script.name: mm_update_window
Script.script:
if true or not Geyser then return end local affslabel local main = Geyser.Container:new({x=0,y=0,width="100%",height="100%",name="affslabelcontainer"}) affslabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "affslabel", x = "87%", y = "80%", width = "11%", height = "17%"}, main) -- this sets the colour of the whole label to greenish affslabel:setColor(100,155,0,127) local function highlight(name) if not mm.ignore[name] then return name else return string.format([[%s]], name) end end function mm_update_window() local s = {} if not affslabel then return end for name, namet in pairs(mm.affl) do if name ~= "deaf" and name ~= "blind" then if type(namet) == "table" and namet.count then s[#s+1] = string.format("%s (%d)", highlight(name), namet.count) else s[#s+1] = highlight(name) end end end affslabel:echo([[]].. table.concat(s, "
") .."") end

ScriptGroup.name: Utils
ScriptGroup.script:
function mm.inslowcuringmode() return (mm.affl.choke or mm.affl.aeon or mm.affl.sap) and true or false end
function mm.show_vessels(num) mm.prompttrigger("show vessels count", function() local vessels = {} for aff, _ in pairs(mm.affl) do if string.find(aff, "vessel", 1, true) then vessels[#vessels+1] = aff end end if #vessels ~= 0 then mm.echofn("We've got ~") setBold(true) echo(table.concat(vessels, ", ")) setBold(false) setFgColor(unpack(mm.getDefaultColorNums)) echo(" now.\n") end end) end
function mm.echotime(s) moveCursor(0, getLineNumber()-1) moveCursor(#getCurrentLine(), getLineNumber())
deselect() fg("dark_slate_gray") insertText(' ('..s..'s)')
moveCursorEnd() end
-- originally from Sidd, improved by Lynara function mm.boxDisplay(msg, color) local colTbl = {} if color then colTbl = string.split(color, ":") for k = 1,2 do if colTbl[k] == "" then colTbl[k] = nil end end if colTbl[2] then bg(colTbl[2]) end end colTbl[1] = colTbl[1] or "red" fg(colTbl[1]) local leng = ((2*string.len(msg)) + 11) local mes = string.upper(msg) echo("\n ") echo( string.rep("-", leng+2) ) echo(" \n| " .. mes .. " | " .. mes .. " |\n ") echo( string.rep("-", leng+2) ) echo(" \n") resetFormat() end
boxDisplay = mm.boxDisplay
function mm.cc(...) if mm.conf.paused or mm.inslowcuringmode() then return end
local sendto, method if not mm.conf.ccto or mm.conf.ccto == 'sqt' or mm.conf.ccto == 'squad' then sendto = "sqt " elseif mm.conf.ccto == 'clt' then sendto = "clt " elseif mm.conf.ccto:find("^tell %w+") then sendto = "tell "..mm.conf.ccto:match("^tell (%w+)").." " elseif mm.conf.ccto == 'ot' then sendto = "ot " elseif mm.conf.ccto == 'team' then sendto = "team " elseif mm.conf.ccto == 'coven' then sendto = "coven " elseif mm.conf.ccto == 'echo' then method = mm.echof; sendto = "" else sendto = "clan "..mm.conf.ccto.." tell " end
if not method then send(sendto .. string.format(...), false) else (method)(sendto .. string.format(...)) end end
function mm.F2C(F) return string.format("%0.1f", (tonumber(F) - 32) * (5/9)) end
function mm.echoafftime(s) if isPrompt() then moveCursor(0, getLineNumber()-1) moveCursor(#getCurrentLine(), getLineNumber()) end
deselect() fg("DarkGoldenrod") insertText(' ('..s..'s)') deselect() resetFormat() moveCursorEnd() end
function mm.preattack() if mm.inslowcuringmode() then return end
if mm.affl.prone then send'stand' end end
function mm.givebombwarning(attacker, attack) mm.givewarning({ initialmsg = attacker.. " started "..attack..", goes off in 10s", prefixwarning = attacker.. " "..attack.." 10s", duration = 2 })
tempTimer(5, function() mm.givewarning({ initialmsg = attacker.. "'s "..attack.." in 5s", prefixwarning = attacker.. " "..attack.." 5s", duration = 1 }) end)
tempTimer(8, function() mm.givewarning({ initialmsg = attacker.. "'s "..attack.." in 2s", prefixwarning = attacker.. " "..attack.." 2s", duration = 1 }) end)
tempTimer(9, function() mm.givewarning({ initialmsg = attacker.. "'s "..attack.." in 1s", prefixwarning = attacker.. " "..attack.." 1s", duration = 1 }) end) end

Script.name: mm_whoi_done
Script.script:
function mm_whoi_done(_, data) if not data:find("whoi", 1, true) then return end
local function savetondb(names) if not ndb then return end
local temp_name_list = {} for i = 1, #names do temp_name_list[#temp_name_list + 1] = {name = names[i]} end
db:merge_unique(ndb.db.people, temp_name_list) raiseEvent("NameDB got new data") end
io.input(data) local s = io.read("*a")
local t, count = {}, 0 for name in string.gfind(s, "/game/honors/Lusternia/(%w+)") do t[#t+1] = name end count = string.match(s, "Total: (%d+) players online")
mm.echof("People on (%s):", tostring(count))
if hl and hl.isEnemy then local enemies, neutrals = {}, {} for k,v in ipairs(t) do if hl.isEnemy(v) then enemies[#enemies+1] = v else neutrals[#neutrals+1] = v end end
echo" " mm.echof("Enemies (%s):", #enemies) echo(" "..table.concat(enemies, ", ")) echo"\n" echo" " mm.echof("Others (%s):", #neutrals) echo(" "..table.concat(neutrals, ", ")) else echo(table.concat(t, ", ")) end
echo"\n" savetondb(t) mm.showprompt() end

Script.name: mm_check_land

mm_downloaded_file
Script.script:
function mm_downloaded_file(_, filename) -- is the file that downloaded our oursystem?
if filename == tostring(mm.versionfile) then mm.checkingupdates = false
local s = io.open(filename):read("*a") if mm.version == s:trim() then if mm.announceupdates == "checking" then mm.announceupdates = nil mm.echof("You're all good! Latest version is %s and you're on it.", mm.version) end return end
-- new version? See if we've already downloaded it, if not, do so local f = io.open(getMudletHomeDir().."/m&m/downloads/available_version")
local writtenversion
-- new version file can not exist if we didn't download a system previously if f then writtenversion = f:read("*a") f:close() end
if not writtenversion or writtenversion:trim() ~= s:trim() or not lfs.attributes(getMudletHomeDir().."/m&m/downloads/"..string.format("%s m&m.zip", mm.me.class)) then if mm.announceupdates == "checking" then mm.echof("A new m&m is available! You're on %s, latest is %s. I'll download it for you.", mm.version, s:trim()) end mm.downloadnewsystem(s:trim()) else if mm.announceupdates == "checking" then mm.echof("A new m&m is available and has been downloaded for you! You're on %s, latest is %s.", mm.version, s:trim()) end mm.showupdatereminder(writtenversion) end elseif filename == tostring(mm.downloadedsystem) then mm.checkingupdates = false
-- downloaded a new system zip? Save its version in a file, so on restart if the person hasn't updated, we can poke them about it local f,err = io.open(getMudletHomeDir().."/m&m/downloads/available_version", "w") if not f then return mm.echof("Couldn't write to the new version file, because: "..err) end f:write(mm.newdownloadedversion) f:close()
mm.showupdatereminder(mm.newdownloadedversion) end end

Script.name: Check for updates
Script.script:
local downloadfolder = getMudletHomeDir().."/m&m/downloads/"
-- this should get called at start and every hour after that function mm.checkforupdate(type) if mm.checkingupdates then return end mm.versionfile = downloadfolder.."mm_version"
if not downloadFile then mm.echof("Your version of Mudlet doesn't support downloading files - please upgrade to 2.0+") else if not lfs.attributes(downloadfolder) then if lfs and lfs.mkdir then local t,s = lfs.mkdir(downloadfolder) if not t and s ~= "File exists" then mm.echof("Couldn't make the '"..downloadfolder.."' folder; "..s) return end else mm.echof("Sorry, but you need LuaFileSystem (lfs) installed, or have the '"..downloadfolder.."' folder exist.") return end end
mm.checkingupdates = true downloadFile(mm.versionfile, "http://m-mf.github.io/m-mf/release/current_version")
if type == "checking" then mm.echof("Checking for updates...") mm.announceupdates = "checking" elseif type == "force" then mm.echof("(re)downloading latest system...") mm.announceupdates = "force" mm.version = 0
local location = getMudletHomeDir().."/m&m/downloads/available_version" if io.exists(location) then --local s,m = os.remove(location) if not s then mm.echof("Couldn't remove the %s file (error was: %s) - this might be a problem.", location, m) end end
location = downloadfolder..string.format("%s m&mf.zip", mm.me.class) if io.exists(location) then local s,m = os.remove(location) if not s then mm.echof("Couldn't delete the old m&m zip (located at %s), because of: %s. This might be a problem.", location, m) end end else mm.announceupdates = nil end end end
-- downloads the system & updates the system version saved function mm.downloadnewsystem(newversion) mm.downloadedsystem = downloadfolder..string.format("%s m&mf.zip", mm.me.class) local downloadurl = [[http://m-mf.github.io/m-mf/release/]]..mm.me.class..[[.m-mf.v]]..newversion..[[.zip]]
downloadFile(mm.downloadedsystem, downloadurl) mm.newdownloadedversion = newversion end
